'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
{{Description|In the distance, you spy a mine set into the side of a hill, its entrance just barely peeking out from between the trees. As you near the mine, a loud explosion rocks the ground. A flurry of terrified birds burst from nearby trees, and a massive cloud of dust rockets out of the cave mouth.}}

==Points of interest==
* A straightforward location at 7° 46’ S, 57° 16’ E, where [[Eccea]] and her team are trying to loot the mine, but badly misjudged its stability and the effects of black powder on it. Once you come a short distance inside, you'll be greeted by a cutscene, which will reveal disagreements within, then Eccea will leave to keep watch.

==Characters==
* [[Eccea]], [[Nathrak]], [[Chei]], [[Tairo]], [[Ulgrim]], [[Munric]]

==Loot==
* [[Eccea's Arcane Blaster]] and [[Eccea’s Grimoire]]: Carried by the eponymous wizard.
* [[Adra Ban]] x1.
* Superb Spear, Superb Large Shield, Superb Brigandine, and several exceptional pieces.
